resolution_description: Initiator: Teacher, Resolution: Establish a "Knowledge Co-Creation Lab" where students and teachers collaboratively design the curriculum and assessment methods, integrating interdisciplinary projects and community-driven initiatives that reflect real-world challenges, thus empowering students to demonstrate their knowledge through meaningful contributions to society and reshaping the traditional educational paradigm.

required_participants.reasoning: Students are essential for the Knowledge Co-Creation Lab as their active involvement in designing the curriculum and assessment methods ensures that the educational experience is relevant and engaging. Their perspectives on real-world challenges will drive the initiatives and projects.

A community of colleagues, including educators and researchers, will provide valuable insights, expertise, and resources necessary to develop interdisciplinary projects. Their collaboration will enrich the curriculum and ensure that it is grounded in academic research and best practices.

Employers play a crucial role in aligning the curriculum with the skills and competencies required in the workforce. Their input will help ensure that the projects and assessments developed in the lab are relevant to real-world job markets and community needs.

AI-enabled learning can enhance the educational experience by providing personalized learning paths and data-driven insights. Integrating AI into the Knowledge Co-Creation Lab will facilitate innovative teaching methods and assessment strategies that reflect the demands of the digital age.

resolution_description: Преподаватели могут предложить создание динамической системы оценки знаний, которая включает в себя "портфолио роста" каждого студента, отражающее его прогресс через регулярные самооценки, обратную связь от преподавателей и коллег, а также интеграцию реального опыта и проектов, что позволяет непрерывно адаптироваться и отражать истинный уровень знаний и навыков.
new_actor: Актор: "Динамическая система оценки знаний с портфолио роста"

agreement_structure.current_action: Сотрудничество с учебными заведениями для стажировок и практики студентов

agreement_structure.reasoning: The proposed resolution aligns closely with the goals of 'AI-enabled learning' to enhance personalized learning experiences and improve student engagement. By adopting an 'Adaptive Intelligence Assessment System', we can leverage AI technologies to provide real-time evaluations and tailored educational pathways. This not only helps in achieving better learning outcomes but also allows for immediate feedback, which is crucial for effective learning. Furthermore, it supports the integration of AI-driven analytics, thus fulfilling the desire to utilize data effectively while mitigating any potential fears related to static assessment methods.
